text: Cornelia "Cox" Habbema (21 March 1944 â€“ 18 April 2016) was a Dutch movie and television actress.Goble p. 196 From 1968 to 1984 she played in movies for the East-German filmproduction DEFA. She was known for her roles in To Grab the Ring (1968), Eolomea (1972), The Incorrigible Barbara (1977), Apprehension (1982) and A Question of Silence (1982). She was born in Amsterdam, North Holland, Netherlands. Habbema died of cancer in Amsterdam on 18 April 2016, aged 72. ==Notes== ==Other websites== * Category:1944 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in the Netherlands Category:Dutch movie actors Category:Dutch television actors Category:Actors from Amsterdam
title: Cox Habbema
